response.overview: A captivating documentary that ventures beyond the waves, exploring the profound relationship between surfers and their environment. Through stunning visuals and personal anecdotes, the film paints a vivid portrait of the surfing lifestyle. From dawn hikes through untouched landscapes to evenings spent sharing stories around campfires, it’s a celebration of passion, friendship, and the deep bond between humans and the ocean. Official Selection 2023: Surf FIlm Festival Anglet.
response.title: Au rythme de l’océan
